tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Trial_Results (
   trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   drug_id INT NOT NULL,
   patient_id INT NOT NULL,
   trial_date DATE NOT NULL,
   result VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug_Efficacy_Safety(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ClinicalTrial (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  drug_id INT NOT NULL,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  study_id INT NOT NULL,
  trial_date DATE NOT NULL,
  trial_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE drug ( 
    drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    name VARCHAR(255), 
    type VARCHAR(100), 
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100), 
    efficacy_rating INT, 
    safety_rating INT 
)

CREATE TABLE trial ( 
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    drug_id INT, 
    patient_id INT, 
    trial_date DATE, 
    result VARCHAR(50) 
)

CREATE TABLE patient ( 
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    name VARCHAR(255), 
    age INT, 
    gender VARCHAR(10), 
    location VARCHAR(100) 
)

CREATE TABLE side_effects ( 
    effect_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    drug_id INT, 
    side_effect VARCHAR(100), 
    severity INT 
)

CREATE TABLE dosage ( 
    dosage_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    drug_id INT, 
    patient_id INT, 
    dosage_amount INT, 
    schedule VARCHAR(50) 
)
